verses.verse: הוֹד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> O give thanks לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> for [he is] good כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

ה֭וֹדוּ <S%H3034><s%> O give thanks לֵֽאלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> unto the God הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of gods כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

ה֭וֹדוּ <S%H3034><s%> O give thanks לַאֲדֹנֵ֣י <S%H113><s%> to the Lord הָאֲדֹנִ֑ים <S%H113><s%> of lords כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

לְעֹ֘שֵׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> To him who alone doeth נִפְלָא֣וֹת <S%H6381><s%> wonders גְּדֹל֣וֹת <S%H1419><s%> great לְבַדּ֑וֹ <S%H905><s%> alone כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

לְעֹשֵׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> made הַ֭שָּׁמַיִם <S%H8064><s%> the heavens בִּתְבוּנָ֑ה <S%H8394><s%> To him that by wisdom כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

לְרֹקַ֣ע <S%H7554><s%> To him that stretched out הָ֭אָרֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above הַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> above the waters כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

לְ֭עֹשֵׂה <S%H6213><s%> To him that made אוֹרִ֣ים <S%H216><s%> lights גְּדֹלִ֑ים <S%H1419><s%> great כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֭שֶּׁמֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> The sun לְמֶמְשֶׁ֣לֶת <S%H4475><s%> to rule בַּיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> by day כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיָּרֵ֣חַ <S%H3394><s%> The moon וְ֭כוֹכָבִים <S%H3556><s%> and stars לְמֶמְשְׁל֣וֹת <S%H4475><s%> to rule בַּלָּ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> by night כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

לְמַכֵּ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> To him that smote מִ֭צְרַיִם <S%H4714><s%> Egypt בִּבְכוֹרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H1060><s%> in their firstborn כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

וַיּוֹצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> And brought out יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> Israel מִתּוֹכָ֑ם <S%H8432><s%> from among כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> them for his mercy

בְּיָ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> hand חֲ֭זָקָה <S%H2389><s%> With a strong וּבִזְר֣וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> arm נְטוּיָ֑ה <S%H5186><s%> and with a stretched out כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

לְגֹזֵ֣ר <S%H1504><s%> To him which divided יַם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea ס֭וּף <S%H5488><s%> the Red לִגְזָרִ֑ים <S%H1506><s%> into parts כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

וְהֶעֱבִ֣יר <S%H5674><s%> to pass through יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> And made Israel בְּתוֹכ֑וֹ <S%H8432><s%> the midst כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> of it for his mercy

וְנִ֘עֵ֤ר <S%H5287><s%> But overthrew פַּרְעֹ֣ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh וְחֵיל֣וֹ <S%H2428><s%> and his host בְיַם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea ס֑וּף <S%H5488><s%> in the Red כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

לְמוֹלִ֣יךְ <S%H1980><s%> led עַ֭מּוֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> through the wilderness כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

לְ֭מַכֵּה <S%H5221><s%> To him which smote מְלָכִ֣ים <S%H4428><s%> kings גְּדֹלִ֑ים <S%H1419><s%> great כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

וַֽ֭יַּהֲרֹג <S%H2026><s%> And slew מְלָכִ֣ים <S%H4428><s%> kings אַדִּירִ֑ים <S%H117><s%> famous כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

לְ֭סִיחוֹן <S%H5511><s%> Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king הָאֱמֹרִ֑י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

וּ֭לְעוֹג <S%H5747><s%> And Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king הַבָּשָׁ֑ן <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

וְנָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> And gave אַרְצָ֣ם <S%H776><s%> their land לְנַחֲלָ֑ה <S%H5159><s%> for an heritage כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

נַ֭חֲלָה <S%H5159><s%> [Even] an heritage לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> unto Israel עַבְדּ֑וֹ <S%H5650><s%> his servant כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

שֶׁ֭בְּשִׁפְלֵנוּ <S%H8216><s%> us in our low estate זָ֣כַר <S%H2142><s%> Who remembered לָ֑נוּ כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

וַיִּפְרְקֵ֥נוּ <S%H6561><s%> And hath redeemed מִצָּרֵ֑ינוּ <S%H6862><s%> us from our enemies כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> Who giveth לֶ֭חֶם <S%H3899><s%> food לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all בָּשָׂ֑ר <S%H1320><s%> to all flesh כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

ה֭וֹדוּ <S%H3034><s%> O give thanks לְאֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> unto the God הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy
